verses.name: Isaiah 37:17
verses.text: Incline thine ear, O Lord, and hear; open thine eyes, O Lord, and see: and hear all the words of Sennacherib, which hath sent to reproach the living God.

verses.name: Isaiah 37:18
verses.text: Of a truth, Lord, the kings of Assyria have laid waste all the nations, and their countries,

verses.name: Isaiah 37:19
verses.text: And have cast their gods into the fire: for they were no gods, but the work of men’s hands, wood and stone: therefore they have destroyed them.
